aacd2455-2c22-47ad-b332-59a7a2724612.description: Team Ignition is a radically new immersive workshop series to awaken your team to partner together in new ways, be able to deliver goals that seem out of reach, and develop capabilities that are not present today. We kick start your team by coaching them to new ways of working. When we shift team behaviors, you get elevated and expedited results.
aacd2455-2c22-47ad-b332-59a7a2724612.name: Rebels With A Cause - Team Ignition

badge_template_activities.title: Each participant will attend the full 14-module Team Ignition series and complete the final assessment. During each session, the team will receive coaching from Rob Whitfield, CEO, as the team members engage one another in candid, collaborative dialogue on key business opportunities. Participants will begin to awaken to Co-Elevation possibilities, and start to experience a shift to strong abundance mindsets where the team engages in new ways of working that accelerate and elevate results.

2d37c7e2-a74a-493b-a353-e2200b5ddb33.description: Our Agile: Value In Action (AVIA) Methodology coaches behavior that cuts across silos, builds a team-first mindset, and drives to faster outcomes. Facilitators uncover blockers and structure an environment that increases candor, eliminates conflict avoidance, and creates a unified focus on results and winning. The Core Facilitator Foundation is the first step in a multi-tiered series whereby participants can become a fully certified Coach and/or Facilitator and even Enterprise Network Coach.
2d37c7e2-a74a-493b-a353-e2200b5ddb33.name: AVIA Core Facilitator Foundation

badge_template_activities.title: This program will introduce core foundational facilitation concepts from Agile, and allow participants to practice these in a safe environment and coach each other on these practices and tools. The outcome will be short-term business results and a foundation to enable long-term success. The participants will complete the curriculum to gain understanding and practical experience of a wide array of practical techniques used by professional facilitators in and beyond Agile settings.

06ac9455-b9d8-4dfe-9973-8aabdde44afb.description: Our Agile: Value In Action (AVIA) Methodology coaches behavior that cuts across silos, builds a team-first mindset, and drives to faster outcomes. Coaches create a safe environment to go beyond collaboration, and curate healthy conflict resolution within teams. The AVIA Agile Coach guides individuals and teams through transformations to help achieve accretive business outcomes. Participants become a fully certified AVIA Agile Coach.
06ac9455-b9d8-4dfe-9973-8aabdde44afb.name: AVIA Agile Coach

badge_template_activities.title: To acquire this badge, participants will have to coach individuals and teams in meetings and working sessions. In addition, they will have utilized key practices, skills and behaviors to coach and mentor individuals and teams through different change types. The certified AVIA Agile Coach will complete the curriculum and have demonstrated practical experience, with a toolkit of coaching skills and practices.

0ed37fb1-4de0-42bb-a0a9-56e1edb982ee.description: Our Agile: Value In Action (AVIA) Methodology coaches behavior that cuts across silos, builds a team-first mindset, and drives to faster outcomes. Facilitators uncover blockers and structure an environment that increases candor, eliminates conflict avoidance, and creates a unified focus on results and winning. Participants become a fully certified AVIA Agile Facilitator.
0ed37fb1-4de0-42bb-a0a9-56e1edb982ee.name: AVIA Agile Facilitator

badge_template_activities.title: To acquire this badge, participants will have to facilitate meetings and working sessions between different types of clients. In addition, they will have to identify the difference between facilitation and inter-network facilitation and work with cross-organizational leadership teams consisting of other coaches and facilitators.

b67ac251-c398-4e75-87f6-c8e18a74ff82.description: Our Agile: Value In Action (AVIA) Methodology coaches behavior that cuts across silos, builds a team-first mindset, and drives to faster outcomes. Facilitators uncover blockers and structure an environment that increases candor, eliminates conflict avoidance, and creates a unified focus on results and winning. The Core Facilitator Foundation is the first step in a multi-tiered series whereby participants can become a fully certified Coach and/or Facilitator, and even Enterprise Network Coach.
b67ac251-c398-4e75-87f6-c8e18a74ff82.name: AVIA Agile Value In Action

badge_template_activities.title: This credential extends the AVIA Level 1 Core Practitioner certification and goes deeper into effective Agile Facilitation (Level 2). This credential certifies the demonstration of real life experience using AVIA practices. Those who complete this certification learn how to facilitate team discussions that are creative, resourceful, and supportive of each other's successes, increasing the adoption of AVIA practices to improve delivery solution clarity and timeliness for individuals and teams.

71bc1184-adb5-40fd-9316-c22c467fd400.description: Our Agile: Value In Action (AVIA) Methodology coaches behavior that cuts across silos, builds a team-first mindset, and drives to faster outcomes. Enterprise Coaches leverage deep experience and practical application to become an expert in AVIA theory and practices at the enterprise level. Furthermore, Enterprise Coaches also develop expertise in organizational development, change, and culture.
71bc1184-adb5-40fd-9316-c22c467fd400.name: Enterprise Coach and Facilitator

badge_template_activities.title: This credential extends the AVIA Level 2 Coach Certification and goes deeper into effective Agile Facilitation (Level 3). This credential certifies the demonstration of practical experience facilitating and coaching with AVIA Enterprise Coaching practices at the enterprise level. Those who complete this certification learn how to measure business and team performance from an AVIA Enterprise view.

56e06a7f-5610-4989-b3ed-052ab928fd4b.description: Our Agile: Value In Action (AVIA) Methodology coaches behavior that cuts across silos, builds a team-first mindset, and drives to faster outcomes. Enterprise Network Facilitators and Coaches master cross-organizational facilitation and coaching, identifying blockers, and enablers. They are also expected to improve inter-enterprise collaboration and efficiency. This is our highest level of achievement within the AVIA Core Facilitator Foundation.
56e06a7f-5610-4989-b3ed-052ab928fd4b.name: Enterprise Network Coach and Facilitator

badge_template_activities.title: This credential extends the AVIA Level 4 Enterprise Network Coach Certification and goes deeper into effective Agile Enterprise Coaching (Level 3). This credential certifies the demonstration of the practical experience facilitating and coaching with AVIA Enterprise Network Coaching practices. Those who complete this certification learn how to apply AVIA across both the Enterprise and all associated Networks connected to that enterprise.

27740335-9d48-40c9-a513-be51e460a2f3.description: Ferrazzi Greenlight Trainer’s Trainer may have two roles: Facilitation and Coaching. Trainer’s Trainers Coaching coach and consult other coaches, managers, and executives to help them transform their internal, customer, and partner outcomes. They coach an entire leadership team or organization, managing varying levels of development to be a force for good in the organization. They understand broader organizational context and identify the best interventions and actions to impact the outcomes.
27740335-9d48-40c9-a513-be51e460a2f3.name: Ferrazzi Greenlight: Trainer’s Trainer Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: To acquire this badge, FG members will have to implement their coaching skill set through other coaches and leaders to better their coaching and leadership skills. Furthermore, they will co-create a shared culture and commitment to a joint mission across the organization.

8671ccd9-dfe5-4f96-9d16-af8fca599c0d.description: Ferrazzi Greenlight Trainer’s Trainer has two roles: Facilitation and Coaching. Trainer’s Trainer Facilitation gains a deep level of understanding of a wide array of practical techniques used by professional facilitators. They facilitate other coaches, managers, and executives to help them transform their internal, customer, and partner results. Finally, they manage varying levels of development to be a force for good in the organization.
8671ccd9-dfe5-4f96-9d16-af8fca599c0d.name: Ferrazzi Greenlight: Trainer’s Trainer Facilitation

badge_template_activities.title: To acquire this badge, FG members will have to facilitate meetings and working sessions between different types of clients. In addition, they will have to identify the difference between facilitation and inter-network facilitation and work with cross-organizational leadership teams consisting of other coaches and facilitators.

b5b09b39-4e96-4085-9b08-4217b2b7ee79.description: The Ferrazzi Leadership Program designed and facilitated by Keith Ferrazzi, is a step-by-step roadmap and framework for Co-Elevation® and growth. You will learn to reboot and recontract assumptions of how to work together and show up. This program will teach what it means to lead, be a team member, and how to engage and lean in to be responsible for one another's success.
b5b09b39-4e96-4085-9b08-4217b2b7ee79.name: Ferrazzi Leadership Program

badge_template_activities.title: To acquire this badge, you will need to complete The Ferrazzi Leadership Program. This includes the completion of a leadership assessment, team diagnostic outline, 16 video online course, and a step-by-step roadmap transformation.
